resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/81424</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>81424</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4621</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Management</string>
            <string language="es">Gestión</string>
            <string language="ga">Bainistíocht</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Management</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Gestion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Gerência</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gestione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαχείριση</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Factsheet with a clear definition of management and the characteristics of a good manager. Distinctions are made between the roles of management and enterprise and leadership.</string>
            <string language="es">Hoja informativa con una definición sencilla de la gestión y las características de un buen gestor. Se hacen distinciones entre los papeles de la gestión, la empresa y el liderazgo.</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog fírice le sainmhíniú ar bhainistíocht agus tréithe bainisteora maith. Aithnítear difríochtaí idir róil na bainistíochta, na fiontraíochta agus na ceannaireachta.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Business</string>
            <string language="es">Empresariales. Hoja de trabajo</string>
            <string language="ga">Gnó</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Worksheet</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog Oibre</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Checkliste mit einer freien Definition des 
Managements und den Eigenschaften eines guten Managers. 
Unterscheidungen werden zwischen den Rollen des Managements und 
Unternehmen und Führung getroffen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Fiche de données avec une définition précise 
de gestion et les caractéristiques d'un bon gestionnaire. Des 
distinctions sont faites entre les rôles de la gestion et entreprise 
et conduite.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Factsheet com uma definição desobstruída da 
gerência e as características de um gerente bom. As 
distinções são feitas entre os papéis da gerência e empresa e 
liderança.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scheda con una definizione precisa della gestione
e le caratteristiche di buon gestore. Le distinzioni sono fatte 
fra i ruoli della gestione ed impresa e direzione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ενημερωτικό δελτίο με έναν σαφή καθορισμό της 
διαχείρισης και τα χαρακτηριστικά ενός καλού διευθυντή. Οι 
διακρίσεις γίνονται μεταξύ των ρόλων της διαχείρισης και της 
επιχείρησης και της ηγεσίας.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschäft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bogen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Affaires</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tableau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Negócio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Commercio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio di lavoro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιχείρηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο εργασίας</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

          <description>
            <string language="en">The content on this site is protected by copyright under Irish and European law. All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.

Material within the linked sites outside of Scoilnet may also have copyright restrictions and this should be checked on these websites should you plan to use their content in any way.</string>
